lead_paragraph: Chronic dreamer, Frank Hopper, is convinced he's hit the jackpot when gets to finance his dream of creating an all-women's ice hockey team by a random credit card he gets in the mail.
snippet: Chronic dreamer, Frank Hopper, is convinced he's hit the jackpot when gets to finance his dream of creating an all-women's ice hockey team by a random credit card he gets in the mail.
